ygData.subject: Re: starting smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: Find some ore, and make some metal bits.  Say four stacks worth, as you will fail a few times making these.  Make some scalers with the bits, then make more
ygData.messageBody:
Find some ore, and make some metal bits. Say four stacks worth, as you will fail a few times making these. Make some scalers with the bits, then make more bits. Once bits become trivial, make a full backpack or two of them. This is major carpal tunnel syndrom time, but it's necessary to do. Keep making scalers until trivial. Move on to lanterns, they cost a little more, but you fail a lot less, and don't lose much money. Scalers are last until your skill hits 115, then you can try pots to 125(?) then sewing kits. Although I found that pots and sewing kits don't give you very much skill. Once you hit 125 in skill just sell all armor.
--
